page.topic: Creating and Programming a Hotspot with Action Scripting
page.description: The following procedure assumes that the developer has opened the form in the Form Editor . Follow these instructions to use Action Scripting to create and format a hotspot similar to hotspot4 .

step.description: Sketch the hotspot on the form.
When the Define Hotspot dialog box appears, click the Use Action Scripting Editor option button.
In the Select Action dialog box, select "Form/Browse" in the Category list.
Select "Open Form or Browse Layout" in the Action list.
Select "Help" in the Layout Name list.
Click Next > in the Open Form or Browse Layout dialog box.
